name: Fully Synthetic Engine Oils
description: Engineered for high-performance and luxury vehicles. Delivers exceptional protection and efficiency. Meets and exceeds latest industry standards.
benefits: Superior Wear Protection: Reduces friction and wear, extending engine life.
Thermal Stability: Maintains viscosity and performance in extreme temperatures.
Fuel Economy: Enhances fuel efficiency by reducing engine drag.
Long Oil Life: Extended drain intervals save time and money.
Clean Engine: Keeps engines cleaner by preventing sludge and deposit formation.

name: Semi-Synthetic Engine Oils
description: Perfect blend of synthetic and mineral base oils. Offers enhanced protection and performance at an affordable price. Ideal for modern cars and light trucks.
benefits: Engine Cleanliness: Improved detergent properties keep engines clean.
Oxidation Stability: Resists breakdown under high temperatures.
Temperature Performance: Reliable performance in both high and low temperatures.
Wear Protection: Reduces engine wear and extends component life.

name: Automatic Transmission Fluids
description: Ensures smooth and reliable operation of automatic transmissions. Enhances performance and extends transmission life.
benefits: High-Temperature Stability: Maintains performance in high-temperature environments.
Smooth Shifting: Ensures smooth and consistent gear changes.
Extended Transmission Life: Protects against wear and extends the life of transmission components.
Anti-Wear Properties: Prevents wear and tear of transmission parts.

name: Gear Oils
description: Provides superior protection for gear systems. Ensures smooth and efficient operation under high load and stress.
benefits: Load-Carrying Capacity: Excellent performance in high-load situations.
Wear and Corrosion Protection: Protects gear systems from wear and corrosion.
Thermal Stability: Maintains viscosity and performance across a wide temperature range.
